description.ruby-sapphire:
Charms the foe and sharply
reduces its ATTACK.
description.emerald:
Charms the foe and sharply
reduces its ATTACK.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is charmed
by the user’s cute
appeals, sharply
cutting its ATTACK.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.
description.platinum:
The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.
description.black-white:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target’s Attack is harshly lowered.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target’s Attack is harshly lowered.
description.x-y:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
This harshly lowers its Attack stat.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
This harshly lowers its Attack stat.
description.sun-moon:
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,
making it less wary. This harshly lowers its
Attack stat.

The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,

The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,
making it less wary. This harshly lowers its
Attack stat.
description.sword-shield:
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,
making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target’s
Attack stat.

effect.full: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
